alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:37PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Calhoun County through 515 PM CDT... At 437 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ohatchee, or 8 miles northwest of Saks. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ohatchee, Alexandria and Neely Henry Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
